name: The Stakt Mat Pro
description:
Everything you love about the Stakt Mat, plus a premium textured layer for enhanced performance.
What makes the Stakt Mat Pro different?


 
Premium Durability: The premium textured layer provides added strength, ensuring your mat stands up to even the most rigorous workouts.


Superior Grip: Perfect for high-impact exercises, sneaker-clad routines, and those intense sweaty yoga sessions, the Stakt Mat Pro offers unmatched stability and support.

12 mm thick, 69" L x 24 W" Flat, 12" L x 3" H x 24" W Folded
Patent #US-D1050762-S

name: The Stakt Mat
description:
Stakt is the only 2 in 1 fitness mat that doubles as a block for added versatility in your workouts and extra support for whichever way you move. This reimagined yoga mat is twice as thick and super lightweight.
12 mm thick, 69" L x 24 W" Flat, 12" L x 3" H x 24" W FoldedPatent #US-D1050762-S

name: The Strength Set
description: Meet your power couple: The Stakt Mat Pro and The Stakt Weights. The Mat Pro keeps you grounded with superior support and comfort during any workout, while the adjustable weights let you customize your workout on the fly.The Strength Set Includes:The Stakt Mat ProThe Stakt Weights

name: The Stakt Starter Set
description:
Your go-to essentials for a full body workout.


The Stakt Mat: 2-in-1 foldable fitness mat that doubles as a block to enhance or modify your workouts. 2X thicker than your average yoga mat.

The Stakt Weights: 2-4-6 Adjustable Hand Weights

The Cleanser Spray: Keep your mat smelling fresh and free from surface dirt, stains and odors 


The Carrier Bag:  Our ultra-convenient bag makes taking your lightweight Stakt mat to any yoga class, workout studio, gym, park and more super easy

name: The Bring Stakt Anywhere Set
description:
Take your fitness routine anywhere with The Bring Stakt Anywhere Set. This complete on-the-go bundle features a lightweight stakt mat for stable support, a sweat-wicking towel to keep you dry, a cleanser spray to keep your equipment clean and a convenient carry bag that makes transport effortless. Whether you're hitting the park, traveling, or working out at home, everything you need is packed and ready to go.The Bring Stakt Anywhere Set Includes:
The Stakt Mat
The Bag
The Mat Towel
The Cleanser Spray

name: The New Year Set
description:
Start the year strong with The New Year Set. Designed for every stage of your movement journey, it’s the perfect way to build momentum and set your goals in motion.
The New Year Set includes:

Best-selling Stakt Mat Pro

Oprah's favorite adjustable Stakt Weights

Stakt's extra cozy Grip Socks
